reviewText: A very well thought out presentation of how we think along with excellent graphics to help understand and express the ideas.
Interesting & thought provoking. Useful for day to day decision making

Loved the style of the presentation, not something you will see on a daily basis.
Also it covered so many aspects of how we think.
Bill Johnson didn't leave anything out in his presentation.

The Basis of Thought is a compelling journey into the human mind. This captivating production is presented in a fun, easy to comprehend style that can be enjoyed by all ages. Bill Johnson, the author, is brilliant in his ability to open our minds to thoroughly understanding the method we use in order to think. It was quite fascinating to watch this DVD and learn his extraordinary concept for The Basis of Thought. Overall an outstanding resource Iddefinitelyrecommend to everyone.
I thought it was extremely thought provoking.
